meanings.definition: Not based on or conforming to what is generally done or believed.
meanings.sent1: Her unconventional outfit showed her unconventionality in fashion choices.
meanings.sent2: His unconventionality in approaching problems often led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: The party guests were surprised by the unconventionality of the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unconventionality in using everyday objects as art pieces was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The teacher encouraged unconventionality in the students' project designs.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unconventional.
meanings.sent1: The unconventionality of her ideas made her stand out in the group.
meanings.sent2: His unconventionality was often misunderstood by his more traditional colleagues.
meanings.sent3: The playfulness of the children added an element of unconventionality to the party.
meanings.sent4: The unconventionality of the new restaurant's menu delighted adventurous foodies.
meanings.sent5: The unconventionality of the design captured everyone's attention at the exhibition.
